price: Mwagira icyo mugaragaza (nk’umugambi wo kurongora abagore b’Intumwa nyuma y’uko itabarutse) cyangwa mukagihisha, mu by’ukuri Allah ni Umumenyi wa byose.
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ شَيۡـًٔا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: in tub'dū shayan aw tukh'fūhu fa-inna al-laha kāna bikulli shayin ʿalīman
